snippet: The I.P.O. of the vehicle transmission systems maker raised more money than expected for its owners, the Carlyle Group and Onex, and values the onetime General Motors division at about $4.2 billion.
abstract: The I.P.O. of the vehicle transmission systems maker raised more money than expected for its owners, the Carlyle Group and Onex, and values the onetime General Motors division at about $4.2 billion.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Allison Transmission to Raise $600 Million in I.P.O.
